title: const slice ptr lang item

milestone.title: Imports and visibility
milestone.description: Multi file compilation and with use, extern and mod.

body:
Following the gdb session of rustc 1.49.0:

```
Temporary breakpoint 1, rust_slice::main () at rust-slice.rs:2
2           let a = [1, 2, 3, 4, 5];
(gdb) n
3           let b = &a[1..3];
(gdb) p &a
$1 = (*mut [i32; 5]) 0x7fffffffd9c4
(gdb) s
core::slice::index::<impl core::ops::index::Index<I> for [T]>::index (self=..., index=...)
    at /rustc/e1884a8e3c3e813aada8254edfa120e85bf5ffca/library/core/src/slice/index.rs:15
15      /rustc/e1884a8e3c3e813aada8254edfa120e85bf5ffca/library/core/src/slice/index.rs: No such file or directory.
(gdb) p self
$2 = &[i32] {data_ptr: 0x7fffffffd9c4, length: 5}
(gdb) p index
$3 = core::ops::range::Range<usize> {start: 1, end: 3}
(gdb) s
<core::ops::range::Range<usize> as core::slice::index::SliceIndex<[T]>>::index (self=..., slice=...)
    at /rustc/e1884a8e3c3e813aada8254edfa120e85bf5ffca/library/core/src/slice/index.rs:235
235     /rustc/e1884a8e3c3e813aada8254edfa120e85bf5ffca/library/core/src/slice/index.rs: No such file or directory.
(gdb) p self
$4 = core::ops::range::Range<usize> {start: 1, end: 3}
(gdb) p slice
$5 = &[i32] {data_ptr: 0x7fffffffd9c4, length: 5}
(gdb) s
237     in /rustc/e1884a8e3c3e813aada8254edfa120e85bf5ffca/library/core/src/slice/index.rs
(gdb) s
core::slice::<impl [T]>::len (self=...) at /rustc/e1884a8e3c3e813aada8254edfa120e85bf5ffca/library/core/src/slice/mod.rs:96
96      /rustc/e1884a8e3c3e813aada8254edfa120e85bf5ffca/library/core/src/slice/mod.rs: No such file or directory.
(gdb) n
97      in /rustc/e1884a8e3c3e813aada8254edfa120e85bf5ffca/library/core/src/slice/mod.rs
(gdb) n
<core::ops::range::Range<usize> as core::slice::index::SliceIndex<[T]>>::index (self=..., slice=...)
    at /rustc/e1884a8e3c3e813aada8254edfa120e85bf5ffca/library/core/src/slice/index.rs:237
237     /rustc/e1884a8e3c3e813aada8254edfa120e85bf5ffca/library/core/src/slice/index.rs: No such file or directory.
(gdb) n
241     in /rustc/e1884a8e3c3e813aada8254edfa120e85bf5ffca/library/core/src/slice/index.rs
(gdb) s
<core::ops::range::Range<usize> as core::slice::index::SliceIndex<[T]>>::get_unchecked (self=..., slice=...)
    at /rustc/e1884a8e3c3e813aada8254edfa120e85bf5ffca/library/core/src/slice/index.rs:222
222     in /rustc/e1884a8e3c3e813aada8254edfa120e85bf5ffca/library/core/src/slice/index.rs
(gdb) s
core::ptr::const_ptr::<impl *const [T]>::as_ptr (self=...)
    at /rustc/e1884a8e3c3e813aada8254edfa120e85bf5ffca/library/core/src/ptr/const_ptr.rs:909
909     /rustc/e1884a8e3c3e813aada8254edfa120e85bf5ffca/library/core/src/ptr/const_ptr.rs: No such file or directory.
(gdb) p self
$6 = *const [i32] {data_ptr: 0x7fffffffd9c4, length: 5}
(gdb) s
core::ptr::const_ptr::<impl *const T>::add (self=0x7fffffffd9c4, count=1)
    at /rustc/e1884a8e3c3e813aada8254edfa120e85bf5ffca/library/core/src/ptr/const_ptr.rs:499
499     in /rustc/e1884a8e3c3e813aada8254edfa120e85bf5ffca/library/core/src/ptr/const_ptr.rs
```

Shows that the const slice ptr lang item as_ptr actually take the slice data_ptr as the pointer not the structure FatPtr as the pointer.

### Meta

- What version of Rust GCC were you using, git sha if possible. 140f6a698b4d7157e6a33cd7b41c27b39ecbf76e
